name: mock up: Video Editing Software Framework
description: mock up is a video editing software framework. It provides a video rendering engine, along with custom filters and animations. By utilizing Mock Up, video editing processes can be described through an intermediate language called muml, allowing the implementation of video editing functions with simple front-end calls.
